addLiquidity((address,address,uint256,ui.details: This function is compliant with fee on transfer tokens

returns.amountXAdded: The amount of token X added
returns.amountXLeft: The amount of token X left (sent back to liquidityParameters.refundTo)
returns.amountYAdded: The amount of token Y added
returns.amountYLeft: The amount of token Y left (sent back to liquidityParameters.refundTo)

addLiquidityNATIVE((address,address,uint.details: This function is compliant with fee on transfer tokens

returns.amountXAdded: The amount of token X added
returns.amountXLeft: The amount of token X left (sent back to liquidityParameters.refundTo)
returns.amountYAdded: The amount of token Y added
returns.amountYLeft: The amount of token Y left (sent back to liquidityParameters.refundTo)

params.factory2: Address of LB DEX V2.2 factory
params.factoryV1: Address of LB DEX V1 factory

params.activeId: The active id of the pair
params.binStep: The bin step in basis point, used to calculate log(1 + binStep)
params.tokenX: The address of the first token
params.tokenY: The address of the second token

returns.pair: The address of the newly created LBPair

returns.lbFactory: The address of the factory V2.1

params.price: The price of y per x (multiplied by 1e36)

returns._0: The id corresponding to this price
The price corresponding to this id

params.amountOut: The amount of token to receive
params.swapForY: Whether you swap X for Y (true), or Y for X (false)

returns.amountIn: The amount of token to send in order to receive amountOut token
returns.amountOutLeft: The amount of token Out that can't be returned due to a lack of liquidity
returns.fee: The amount of fees paid in token sent

params.swapForY: Whether you swap X for Y (true), or Y for X (false)

returns.amountInLeft: The amount of token In that can't be swapped due to a lack of liquidity
returns.amountOut: The amount of token received if amountIn tokenX are sent
returns.fee: The amount of fees paid in token sent

returns.factoryV1: The address of the factory V1

removeLiquidity(address,address,uint16,u.details: This function is compliant with fee on transfer tokens

params.amountXMin: The min amount to receive of token X
params.amountYMin: The min amount to receive of token Y
params.amounts: The list of amounts to burn of each id in `_ids`
params.binStep: The bin step of the LBPair
params.ids: The list of ids to burn

removeLiquidityNATIVE(address,uint16,uin.details: This function is **NOT** compliant with fee on transfer tokens. This is wanted as it would make users pays the fee on transfer twice, use the `removeLiquidity` function to remove liquidity with fee on transfer tokens.

params.amountNATIVEMin: The min amount to receive of NATIVE
params.amountTokenMin: The min amount to receive of token
params.amounts: The list of amounts to burn of each id in `_ids`
params.binStep: The bin step of the LBPair
params.ids: The list of ids to burn

params.amountOutMin: The min amount of token to receive
The min amount of token to receive

params.amountIn: The amount of token to send
params.amountOutMinNATIVE: The min amount of NATIVE to receive

params.amountIn: The amount of token to send
params.amountOutMinNATIVE: The min amount of NATIVE to receive

params.amountIn: The amount of token to send
params.amountOutMin: The min amount of token to receive

params.amountIn: The amount of token to send
params.amountOutMin: The min amount of token to receive

swapNATIVEForExactTokens(uint256,(uint25.details: Will refund any NATIVE amount sent in excess to `msg.sender`

params.amountOut: The amount of tokens to receive

returns.amountsIn: path amounts for every step of the swap

params.amountInMax: The max amount of token to send
params.amountNATIVEOut: The amount of NATIVE to receive

returns.amountsIn: path amounts for every step of the swap

params.amountInMax: The max amount of token to send
params.amountOut: The amount of token to receive

sweep(address,address,uint256).details: Only callable by the factory owner

params.to: The address of the user to send back the tokens

sweepLBToken(address,address,uint256[],u.details: Only callable by the factory owner

params.amounts: The list of amounts to send
params.to: The address of the user to send back the tokens

 @return wnative The address of WNATIVE
